title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 [v1.2.0 + MULTi14 + ALL DLC]
description:
Genre: Simulator, Management, Racing, 3D
Developer: Red Dot Games
Language: ENG| RUS

Release info:
Do not cut
Do not recoded
Interface language support: Russian, English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Polish, Italian, Chinese, Japanese
Change of localization is carried out in the game settings
There is a file of checksums
Game version: 1.2.0
Installation time: ~ 9 minutes
In the installer sounds Kim Waters

Game features:
Photorealistic graphics
More than 40 cars, working with which you will smear hands
More than 10 tools to help inspect cars
More than 1000 parts waiting for you
Start from a small workshop, and then expand it to full size, adding three lifts. The workshop will become a real "pearl".
Many randomly selected orders for execution
The never-ending rally
Multi-level parking, where you can store your cars
Advanced system of improvements in the game (after moving to the next level you can spend points on improvements)
Diagnostic check for vehicle suspension testing
A test track that allows you to test the car (or just gives the opportunity to fool around)
Autodrome to check the car's parameters
Auctions of cars - raise rates and compete with other providers
Workshop on painting with different types of paints and a wide range of shades (you can also polish one element to save money)
Findings from the barn - here you find abandoned cars in the barns - do not forget to look for different parts in them.
Scrap heap (look for parts and rusted cars)
The linker of the car" for mododels

Installation
Mount and install
Play

parsed.dn: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 [v1.2.0   MULTi14   ALL DLC]
parsed.name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 [v1.2.0   MULTi14   ALL DLC]
